r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $682.4K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Communitech. The average
  contract duration was 1.34 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $725.5K. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.4M.
lookup_name: 'COMMUNITECH'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '682.4K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '17%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '185%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '2.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.34'
s421_mean_contract_value: '725.5K'
s425_max_duration: '5'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.4M'
---
